content.detailedDescription: Watering plants in my backyard when i heard jet fighter(s) in sky.  while attempting to see them observed a strange white/silver object in the distant sw sky.  called my wife out and we both watched it for about five minutes or so while it remained stationary.  the object then slowly moved to the nw and faded from view in another five minutes or so. just thought it was another ufo since living  out here in the desert and sitting outside often at night we have seen  objects before.
content.summary: Circular object seen in bright morning sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and father and stepson were gathering nightcrawlers at around 10pm during a stormy lightning night. suddenly my dad told me to look southward in the sky and asked me "what is that?" i didn't look at first then when my dad repeated to look again i did. i seen fireballs falling from the sky and then when i seen lightning that's when i realized there was a football shaped object dropping the fireballs. the object was silent. the fireballs that fell kept up with the object as the object slowly passed by. the fireballs didn't lag behind. i was fascinated as was all of us. we called the police and they came and took a report. they inturn notified grissom afb and they said there was nothing in the vicinity.
content.summary: Seen football shaped object dropping fireballs straight down and fireballs stayed even with object as it flew by.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard looking up at the stars at approximately 8:35pm. the sun had set at 7:25pm, the moon had not risen, and the sky was very clear. i noticed a bright white light traveling fast in a straight line from the northwest to the east. at first i thought it was a plane with landing lights on, but as it traversed the sky the white light did not change.  there were no blinking red and green lights like i have seen many times on planes and jets. 

we see aircraft frequently, because we live near several airports; polomar airport in carlsbad, oceanside airport, and camp pendleton marine airfield. many times i see planes and jets flying at night with landing lights on, but as they move the white landing lights fade from view and the red and green lights become more prominent.

i grabbed my binoculars (nikon action 10x50 6.5 degrees) which were near the house door for bird watching and called my wife outside. looking through the binoculars, i still could not make out any structural details. it was still a bright white light; it did not pulsate.  my wife also observed the object both with and without the binoculars. she stated that she had never seen anything like that before, and did not think that it was a plane.  she went back into the house and i continued to watch it.  suddenly it turned red and about a second later it disappeared.  i thought it could be a satellite or the iss, so i got my wife's ipad which has the esa starwalk app on it. i used it to determine that there were no satellites in the night sky at that time, and that the iss was over the east horizon moving very slow in a different direction.

my reaction was that this was probably a ufo.
content.summary: Bright white light traveling fast changed color to red and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. took a photo at a beach of hotel resort in penang, malaysia where i stayed for personal vacation on 30th/april

2. didn't noticed the object at all when i took the photo. just found there's a strange object in this photo after 4 months later it took.

3. n/a
4. n/a
5. n/a
6. n/a

for question observed the following: (check all that apply) required, have just marked as lights but can't find appropriate item.

also for question
did the object(s) or light(s) do any of the following? (check all that apply) required
i have marked changed direction but chosen this all because i can't find proper answer from the list.
content.summary: Didn't noticed if it is there when i took the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
hola, te mando este correo y adjunto fotografias.
esta mañana ante mis sorpresa creo que vi un ovni, parecia una estrella en el cielo pero a plena luz del dia, se desplazaba muy lentamente hasta que se detuvo al noroeste de mi posicion a unos 6000 pies aproximadamente, de repende se movio de nuevo solo unos 4 o 5 metros en linea recta mas rapidamente y al instante siguiente se disparo en otro angulo a una velocidad imposible perdiendolo de vista, ruego me digan los pasos a seguir en este momento ya que no se a quien dirigirme,un saludo.
content.summary: Hola, te mando este correo y adjunto fotografias. esta mañana ante mis sorpresa creo que vi un ovni, parecia una estrella en el cielo pero a plena luz del dia, se desplazaba muy lentamente hasta que se detuvo al noroeste de mi posicion a unos 6000 pies ap

content.detailedDescription:
My husband saw a very bright white light around 10:30-11pm 8-20-14. he says it was moving very fast, no sound, from the nnw to sse trajectory overhead near fremont, in. sightings have been witnessed through the years here before. he says it was a single, round, like a ball light, not flashing, but he didn't do the 'stretched arm' sizing technique, but said after it was probably smaller than his outstretched arm's thumbnail. he has had other sightings since he's out every so often, while i am not. back in the days when we were out viewing at night we both saw some interesting lights. i've already submitted those two, i think, with no feedback.  

were there any other reports of same in the area that night. 8-20-14 around 10:30 -11 pm. i also need to mention i woke up with my sox on the floor and the covers all turned around?  [name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was returning back home from my soccer practice on friday night, aug. 22, driving hwy 13 south and about to turn on hwy 40 west. at 10.45 pm i've noticed these three white lights disposed in an equilateral triangle shape towards my left, about north-west, with a blinking green light right in the middle. place is close to the dorval airport and also close but not exactly on the main flight path, which i'm very familiar with, and that made me think it could be an airplane. i couldn't see the object itself because of the dark, but only the display of lights, which seemed very unusual for an airplane. plane navigation lights are green and red pulsating on the wings and only put the headlights on when landing. this object had white lights for corners, green pulsating light in the middle, and appeared to be in a static position. i was able to see the object for about 15 seconds, as i was alone in the car and had to keep my eyes on the road...Couldn't stop either on the highway.
content.summary: Lights triangle hovering over saint-laurent quarter

content.detailedDescription:
Estando en la villa de mazo cerca del mirador las toscas (isla de la palma) haciendo fotografã­as de estrellas y paisajes nocturnos, vi por una montaã±a, cerro con bosque dos linternas como las que se llevan en la frente los que caminan o corren en la noche. luces muy claras. pensã© queran dos personas que hacian futing. seguã­ haciendo fotos y cuando quise comprobar por donde venian "esas personas" vi que iban volando pero muy despacio, muy despacio y en linea horizontal y luz fija, una delante de la otra. estuve atento por si podia desprender algãºn ruido pero no se oia nada.Una vez hice las fotos me marche antes de perderlos de vista. no querã­a seguir en ese sitio mã¡s donde yo estaba estaba lejos de contaminaciã³n lumã­nica. hice con prisas unas fotos y estas dos son las que mejor quedaron. fueron tomadas con cã¡mara nikon d80. 
estos fueron los valores de las fotos enviadas:
                 
                       70mm /  f4.5/ 10 seg/ iso 400
content.summary: Como una linterna  frontal. la que se emplean para caminar de noche. luz blanca

content.detailedDescription:
The following experiences shook my foundation and the emotional charge i reacted with had to dissipate before i could report it here. i found through research on the internet that i witnessed orbs and eventually i learned that perhaps orbs may be part of the ufo phenomena. 
 the first inkling that something strange was happening was in the evening at 11:57pm, in the third week of october 2012 i was reading a book in bed by a dim 40 watt light, with a sheer scarf wrapped around the lampshade too, because i do not want to disturb my husband sleeping.  so i was reading my book and then i saw a quick flash of light over the top of my book about 6 feet from my face and about 5 feet in midair. it was a bright, rich, cool blue, like a gas flame blue light flashing briefly, the size of it was about 3 inches, irregularly shaped with sharp pointed edges or fire flares.  i was startled and weirded out.  i quickly looked at my clock to note when it happened, sort of documenting it....I had no evidence other then the time it happened. 
then about two days later i was sitting on the edge of my bed play wrestling with my 8 year old boy. i had gone in to get dressed out of my pajamas and he came running attacking me.  so we were tussling back and forth and my eye caught sight of a perfectly round 12 inch blue orb sitting or hovering near the floor by the doorway. the bedroom door was shut and the doubled walled cellular shade was still pulled down over the window from the night before so the room was really dim.  i stopped wrestling and stared dumbfounded at this orb for awhile. it sat still and i observed the space around it looking for a possible reflecting light source.  my background, studied fine art, worked as a wedding photographer and a scientific photographer, a musician background with awareness of stage lighting design.  basically i am visually trained. so here in my bedroom i am looking for light sources; i wonder if my camera nearby had a flash go off,  then i realize my new camera does not have a flash that could project a steady blue orb.  i looked under the door to see if the morning sunlight could be seeping in the room, but i determined the sunlight was a thin slit under the door and could not project a large homogenous blue light ball.  so running out of reasonable explanations i ask my son to take a look but by the time he turns around the orb just blinked out.  oh, btw, i did take my eyes of the blue ball several times as i was looking around trying to explain it's presence and it remained steady and just sitting there.  ok so i have this magnometer on my iphone and i pull up the app and the thing is buzzing off it's charts and i walk through my house and the magnometer started to drop numbers when i got about 25 feet from the bedroom and further dissipated when i reached the outside porch about 45 feet.  oh and my newish digital camera did not work for a few weeks after these events. so totally freaked now, what was in my bedroom, my safe haven?  later in the evening i pull out a flashlight to show my husband how big it was and then i had a big aha moment... i could show him the size of it and how perfectly round it was but the way the light laid across the small box and the floor/wall corner, i could not duplicate what it looked like.  it seems that the light ball defied the common laws of physics and although i saw it in a 3-d space but it was not behaving like light should in a 3-d space.  i know what i saw but i could not replicate it for my husband. the light waves bent in a way i don't understand.  also the ball did glow brightly but it did not project light, the light did not radiate beyond the ball, i remember that the space, the wall and floor around it was not lit up. the ball did not radiate light but seemed to be completely made of light. 
 finally about two or three days later i was in the same dim bedroom napping in the afternoon and after the nap i was milling around putting away clothes and i saw another blue orb, this time it was smaller, about 7 inches and it was "hiding" under a wicker shelving cabinet near the bedroom door but about 4 feet away from the other orb location.  well theres more! a few days later the blue flash showed up again.  i was in a yoga class about two miles from my home and again in a dimly lit room i saw blue flashes near my body, like two inches away a couple of times.
content.summary: Blue orbs/flashes in my bedroom 3 times in 3 days

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside my backdoor into the backyard to light a cigarette for no apparent reason seeing that i smoke inside. these flashing orbs were everywhere facing towards my house coming from the south. i had no clue what i saw and didnt think anything of it but realized myself back inside my house smoking the same cigarette. the objects were hanging down from the tree branches and flashing and glowing like orbs of light. i had no feelings at this time, it was like i was put into a trance by this phenomena. but all i remember was that i must have spent close to ten minutes outside and distinctly remember walking along the end of my garden and before returning inside looking back facing the south and still seeing the orbs. my observations about this experience was that i was in a trance like state, walking along my garden and feeling the sudden urge to go outside to smoke a cigarette are unexplainable. but sometimes i walk along my garden in the daytime while smoking a cigarette admiring the garden. as soon as i went inside the phenomenon was over. this is extremely unusual, i do feel something was almost calling me outside and i was under some kind of spell like trance like i was possessed by some type of force.
content.summary: Flashing orb objects hanging down from tree branches.

content.detailedDescription:
I was lounging in my backyard pool. as i was floating on my back looking up at the stars i saw one large starlike object appear to be moving.  i stood up to take a better look, i could not identify it as a plane.  the large round light was about the size of venus and was flying rather low and moved somewhat fast, like a jet speed. i thought if it was plane then perhaps it was getting ready to land at the tucson international airport.
the "plane" had no red or green lights, just showed a steady white light and made no sound. so i settled in my pool noodle to follow it awhile. i was looking for blinking lights or red or green and saw none so then the light passed through a thin cloud and it dimmed a bit.  but what got me to report this otherwise fairly benign light was that i watched it enter a lone, fluffy white cloud.  the white cloud was lit up by the city lights, the cloud was smallish, compact and dense with well defined edges, i could easily see faint stars around the whole perimeter. there were no other clouds near it.  so the punchline is this;  the large, white, round light moving at a steady speed and in a straight path entered the small dense cloud and the "ufo" never appeared out the other side.  i watched for it to reappear for a solid 7 minutes to cover all possible angles it could have taken.  i watched so long the cloud was eventually pulled apart by winds.  by the time i gave up looking for the light the cloud was less dense and rather wispy.  that light just disappeared!
content.summary: Bright white light disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside listening to music and playing with my dogs. and i don't know why, but i caught a glimpse of something that was moving around in odd maneuvers and glowing. no aircraft i know of can do these incredible feats.  at first i didn't know, i have always been a "somewhat" believer, but after tonight.. i know it was real. the object was a circular disc-like object and it was hovering about in a location and falling like a leaf, swooping back and forth while it descended. it then began edging it's way closer, and closer. it was getting very close and i was getting worried then it moved at a speed i was amazed by and was almost directly above my head, i began to run as fast and hard as i could, i feared i was not quick enough and it was going to take me. i was terribly frightened. i bust through the door and told the first person i saw.. i told them to feel my heart and they did. it was beating rapidly, i then described it and broke down. i cried.. i was so upset at what i had just saw.  i tried taking a video with my phone, but it proved too dark.  this took place near sunnylane and 44th street in del city, oklahoma.  i returned outside 10 minutes later and it was still flying around doing insane patterns. lighting up at very high distances now. it may have reflected light also. it did this for about 30 minutes.. i'm still looking right now..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing/pulsating starlike round dark object with incredible changes in direction and hovering about in one area

content.detailedDescription: I was at my soccer game which had started at 7 and my mom takes pictures of me so she had her camera. my cousin came to the game and noticed something funny in the sky while looking at the airplanes and it was a weird shape so my mom took a picture and we have never seen anything like it. it's bronze colored and shaped very odd.
content.summary: Weird object floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Translucent green-ish orb traveled right below the haze. it crossed the entire section im 12 seconds. i saw it at about 65-75 degrees consistently. it disappeared in the north. thought it was a bag at first.Realized it was on a a
set path.
content.summary: Greenish orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking my cat. i'm always looking up looking at the stars. i seen an object in the sky, flying slowly and no flashing lights. it was a white light. then out of no where i seen two flashing white lights come in, and they all 3 formed a triangle shape flashing their lights. my feelings was excitement. cause i have never seen anything like it before. i wasn't sure what the object's was. they had no sound. how i lost sight of the objects. they disappeared as fast as they showed up. i didn't see them anymore. my neighbor was outside he only seen the first object. he didn't see the other's and what they done. had a cam with me. didn't think i would get a photo or video on time. it was that fast. 

[name removed/cms/rjl].
content.summary: Seen an object in the sky, flying slowly and no flashing lights. had a white light. and looked like it stopped for a second. then two other objects came in out of no where with white flashing lights. they all 3 formed a triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the beach at low tide in gig harbor wa (forest beach drive), on monday, august 11, 2014 around noon with my children and grandchildren.  i was photographing everyone catching crabs and star fish and looking at shells on the beach.  i just decided to take a picture of the horizon and the lovely scenery.  i did not see anything unusual with my eyes, nor did i see anything but the scenery through the camera lens.  no one with me noticed anything unusual in the sky.  however, when i downloaded the photos later that day i saw the round yellow object in four sequential (rapid shot) photos and the object was in a different position in each one.  i am not saying it's a ufo, but everyone who has seen the photos says it has to be.  the object was too far from land on either side of the bay to have been a frisbee or a remote control plane.  when i zoomed in close on the computer, the object definitely "looks" like a ufo with a little bulge on the top and what looks like a row of windows -- although i'm sure it could be any number of things.  i was standing on the west facing beach, looking out over hales passage (part of puget sound).  the four photos were taken at 12:04:18.
content.summary: I did not see this object until i downloaded photos from my camera.  i did not observe it nor did anyone with me.

content.detailedDescription:
At a camp ground in brown county a fellow camper seemed interested in watching the plane traffic. after a short lull he pointed out what he assumed was another plane much closer than the others seen. he then found something terrestrial to grab his attention and took no more notice. 

although storms were moving into the area, the sky above at that time was clear. this object was slightly south of our location moving nearly due west. 

the shape of the object could be clearly seen as having eight sides like a stop sign with sharp ends instead of rounded. 

there was a star-burst pattern of lights on the bottom that pulsed in a line from one end to the other in the direction of travel. 

at the apparent distance i would guess the speed to have been just over 100mph.

lost sight of the object at it passed behind a line of trees. 

summary:

object made no sound. other craft in the area did.

object was moving against the breeze. not likely a blimp or similar lighter-than-air craft; which would also have had some type of engine to propel it in that direction. 

octagon shape.

star-burst pattern of light on bottom. no other lights visible.

if there were no deviation in the flight path, the object would have had to have passed over camp atterbury, a military camp, approximately two miles due east of our location.
content.summary: Strange light pattern. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30pm, my sister and i noticed a series of white, sequential lights orbiting in a circle outside of my skylight in my bedroom. the lights from my skylight varied from 2-3 different circles. watched the lights moving for about ten minutes, occasionally brightening and dimming, and moving towards my left. got in my car with my sister to check it out, and noticed that it wasn't visible over the tree line, but as we drove further (approximately under one mile) the beams of lights became more visible. at this point, we could see the full circle that the lights were moving in and there were about 6-10 of them. the best look at the series of lights that we got were above a multiple cornfields down the street from our house. didn't go any further past the cornfields because it was private property, but we ended up watching the lights for approximately one hour. we live by a local skydiving place but have never seen anything like this, especially at night when the facility isn't in operation. i look out through my skylight every night and have never seen these lights before. we both feel as though we saw something very strange that overwhelmed us with question about what we were actually seeing.
content.summary: Hovering, sequential white beams of light emitting from tree-line/ground area to the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at the turkey hill inforty-fort pennsylvania gassing up my wife's suv when i happen to look up int the southwestern sky..I spotted 5 or 6 objects moving at a moderate speed in a southeastern direction. at first i taught they were aircraft heading for the forty-fort  airport.I then noticed they were a solid light with no blinking lights.I lived in the area for years and never saw aircraft  flying in a group like that. i got my cell phone out and walked a few steps and snapped a picture.As i tried to take another picture a car pulled in front of me and hindered me from getting another picture. by then the objects were out of site. i knew i saw something strange .I know what i saw was not any type of conventional aircraft. there was no sound or blinking lights. the picture i took did not capture all of them.
content.summary: Spotted objects moving from southwest to southeast.There were at least 5 or 6  moving at a moderate speed.

content.detailedDescription: Just looked through some photos i had taken while doing some astrophotography and found a gigantic cylinder housing inside a moon crater extending through one crater into another.  not sure what it is really and would like some folks to look at it.  there are 2 photos uploaded to you - 1) 1/5 exposure @ iso1600 untouched directly from camera (which was altered for astrophtography and removed the ir filter glass) and 2) photo directly from camera and bright and sharpend up in corel paintshop pro x6 64bit windows 7.
content.summary: Cylinder housing in moon crater extending to conecting crater

content.detailedDescription: Im am 25 years old live in ireland seen alot of strange objects in the night skys over the years while night fishing with friends but recently the frequency has increased dramatically.My bedroom is an attic/loft conversion and all i have to do is stick my head out the skylight to view the night sky .For 2 weeks now iv been seeing the white glowing object appear and dissapear in the distance always in the same location varying degrees of brightness there is no sound from the object it isnt a star as sometimes it blinks out and may not be visible again for hours its not a plane as it appears stationary at times and iv observered planes fying in the sky at the same time and they look nothing alike .This is just the tip of the ice burg i have had a large number of sighting over the years in fact any clear night iv been night fishing with freinds we always seem to see at least one strange object in the sky with multiple sightings fairly common.I would go so far as to say on any cloudless night spent observing the sky here ufos would be seen and possibly in some numbers i have tried filming with my digital camera but it dosnt pick up anything just black
content.summary: For the past 2 weeks the lights appear and dissappear always in the same location

content.detailedDescription:
While using my multi shot feature on my iphone 5s, in an attempt to capture lightning strikes at lake powell in utah, i captured the attached files.

they are in order, and if the iphone multishot takes one frame per fraction of a second, these four frames show an undistinguishable orb traveling at un-earthly speeds in a perfectly direct trajectory.

attempts to manipulate the colors and setting to find definition have not shown much else. the files attached are unaltered.

there is an appearance of some sort of colorization that matches the clouds, but as it moves from darker clouds to lighter, the dark color remains.

if threes four shot encompass about 2.5 seconds, it appears to travel about 50 miles per second.

although the photo is simply a mobile device, i thought you might be able to further filter for some possible clarity. with one saturation level i find something that appears to be a ring, but i am no master of photography, so i offer up these unaltered files in the exact sequence they were taken.

thanks
jimmy
content.summary: Orb detected in one second of multi shot camera during thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription: Just out star gazing when i noticed a small white star like object very high in the sky and it did not appear to have any air craft running lights. the second one was another star like object and it was very bright orange or a fire color.At first i thought it might have been a plane, but when i looked at it thoroughly, i noticed that it did not have aircraft running lights either. all lasted about 2 minutes each. my reaction to all of this was cool. both objects at a certain point just faded out.
content.summary: Watched the two objects for about two minutes or so until they faded out

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone with my sister.   i was looking at the stars. at first i thought it was a helicopter.    it came straight up behind a hill started circling one way then another. then shot north and then east within a second. it then went straight up then back down. then it came flying straight toward my direction then stopped and hovered a few houses down from me. when it stopped all the dogs in the neighborhood started barking a howling. i was scared. i had chills i got a weird vibe from it. i watched it hover for a few minutes longer then ran inside when it slowly started coming closer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was out frony and observerd the object jet straight up out of nowhere at an incredible rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend witnessed this on her way home and pulled over twice to video and take pictures
content.summary: My girlfriend witnessed this on her way home

content.detailedDescription: 10:15 pm i was driving northbound through the intersection of 92nd ave and wadsworth, behind evening traffic when i noticed what i first thought were lights from the top of a large crane to my left.(west) a gold and red light about 11' apart the length of a helicopter. upon a second glance they were descending down towards tree level as they were accelerating past us in traffic. convinced i was seeing a low flying copter with unusual lights, i turned down my radio in car to hear it, through my open moonroof, only to find it was completely silent, despite being, no more than a hundred feet diagonally up to my left (west).  both light accelerated slightly ahead of all traffic then banked diagonally up to the right another 100' or so, never breaking the distance apart from each other, giving the impression it was the tips of a larger black craft. it seemed to hold position above the next oncoming intersection, light when i realized all traffic was slowing as a result of everyone trying to see what it was.( i was behind at least 5 other cars.) as i approached where it was seemingly either stationary or moving very slow directly above me, roughly 200' i glanced up to view the red light through my cars moonroof which was open, i could see the red light was a independent red orb about the size of a basketball. i could not see the gold light as my field of vision was blocked by car roof, i rapidly slowed down to see them both through my windshield, as was the cars in front of me were, when both lights shot off seperately at a very high speed, the gold orb moving away in a north western direction towards the flatirons, and the red north. both went through regular flight paths, of the rocky mountain airport 3 miles north, 2 helicopters were seen, upon arriving to my home, off of 104rth and wadsworth leaving the rocky mt airport and circling.
content.summary: Gold and red light flew alongside car above treetops, passed above and in front then shot off at high speed in opposite directions

content.detailedDescription:
I went out of my home for a cig and i light the cig and i was just looking around it was dark as my garden looks like wood lands as many trees around me 

then i saw 3 red/orange balls of lights but nothing else around them to try to make the shape but nothing there but the 3 round balls

i was looking at them around 1 mail away they was over some homes across from the next street but was the size of 3 beach balls in my face in the shape i have put here using 0

                0

   0     
           0 

so after around 10 minuets looking at them, i then went for my mobile that was right behind me in the patio window but as soon as i got my phone to take a photo they had all gone, i don't know if it was 3 or all 3 red balls was together 

my heart felt as if it had stopped for that 10 minutes & i froze & i didn't think about taking a photo as i was just they with my eyes on them wounding what the hell was they but i have come on here as i have seen many others telling they have seen the same 3 red balls together
content.summary: 3 orange/red round balls size of a beach ball but 1 mile away

content.detailedDescription: I have been using my yard to draw geometric shapes only seen from above ( satellites could see it ). becky was on the phone with me when they came down. i could hear the sound and the animals and the girls talking . they hovered there about 20 min humming  then got louder and  rose slowly then fast.  note  i came to the house the next night at 8:30 friday at the same time the next night the military ( fort drum ) sent a big plane all around the area dropping lots of flairs to cover the previous nights event. the base has never done this before.  if you look up my address and zoom in on the small front yard you will still see my shapes. the ships were v shaped about the size of my house just a little bigger. their hulls were clearly seen by the moon light and the star light that was blocked by the hulls.
content.summary: 8:30 lights and hum overpowered tv dogs & cats fliping out 2 v shaped ships with 3 lights each hovered next to house becky went to door opened up and steped out  loud humming noise and after 20 minuts got louder and rose slowly then fast straight up

content.detailedDescription: Was waiting for daughter's bus and had dog outside with me. looked up because bees were bugging me. saw 2 objects flying from sw to nw. they did not make any sound. both were white did not see any lights. i heard a small plane behind me but the sun was coming from that directions so i didn't look for it. they were going in a straight line one behind the other pretty close. they went behind one tree and only one came out the other side. pulled my cell phone out fast as i could and snapped 2 pics. only got one shot of it before it went behind the other tree and never saw either of them again. sending 2 pics. first is showing it in the circle i put around it to find it. second is same spot but it's gone. the whole thing was like between 15 and 30 seconds. since i've been seeing things more often lately i started taking my phone out with me all the time. also take it out when waiting for bus to text bus assistant, my daughter rides ese bus.
content.summary: Saw 2 objects flying from sw to nw no sound went behind tree only one came out got pics with cell phone

content.detailedDescription:
I, [name removed/cms/rjl] , was at home inside the house. i walked outside to smoke a cigarette. i always look up at the stars, every night. this was not a normal just stare up at the sky looking for a shooting star to wish upon.
*i looked up in the southern sky and witnessed a flash of light. it was originally the size of a star, but the light brightened to about the size of a dime fully extended arms reach. the light went back to original size and went black, disappeared. 
i would say three to six second later it reappeared same original size, a few degrees east of its starting position. i then assumed it was the wing lights of an airplane or aircraft, but then it brightened again and it was like it lite up the sky, like a burst of light. and lastly, disappeared for the final time.    after this i noticed three back to back shooting stars, one in the south western sky and two in the south eastern; all in different directions. and they were not in the same area as the event. 
i know what i saw was not normal. try to put a reason behind what i say, but there's not one. not being my normal self, i said out loud, "i wanna see the light. i wanna see the light again, please show me i'm not crazy, show me something." and it was like i had this nervous scared excited feeling, goose bumps came over my body. i know i said i wanted to see it again, but at the same time i didn't want to. not sure how i would handle that in a mental manner. 

killen, al 163 degrees south, 63 degrees up. 
i know this because i have a sky map downloaded i my phone and after i saw it, i went inside and got my phone because i knew i felt i need to tell somebody i needed to remember this event. i knew it was important and i need to remember it.
content.summary: Star-like, but it was not. because it flashed disappeared and reappeared new location, then disappeared.
